text: Rear Admiral Harley Dean Nygren (December 12, 1924 â€“ November 17, 2019) was an American military officer and photographer. He was in the United States Coast and Geodetic Survey Corps and in the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Officer Corps (NOAA Corps). He was the first Director of the NOAA Corps from 1970 through 1981. Nygren was born in Seattle, Washington. He died on November 17, 2019 at the age of 94.Rear Adm. Harley Nygren, First Director of NOAA Corps, Dies at 94 ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American photographers Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:People from Seattle Category:Military people from Washington (state)
title: Harley D. Nygren
